1333


Classifier B keeps track of previous argument labels
A does not

Sentence no: predicate & argument : observations
12: calculations & their: B chose A1 because chose A0 earlier, A chose A0 a second time (both chose A0 for calculations & those, was incorrect)
13: increase & of: B chose A1 because chose A2 earlier, A chose A2 a second time (both chose A2 for increase & increase, was incorrect)
16: level & producer: B chose A1, A chose A2. No prior arguments seen.
20: gain & in: B chose A2 because chose A1 earlier, A chose A1 a second time (both chose A1 for gain & of, was incorrect)
